text: WKYW-LP (102.9 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Keyser, West Virginia. The station is owned by Mineral County Historical Society, Inc. It airs a variety radio format. The station's studios are located on the campus of Potomac State College of West Virginia University. The station was assigned the WKYW-LP call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on May 22, 2014. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * KYW-LP KYW-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2017 Category:2017 establishments in the United States Category:Variety radio stations in the United States Category:Mineral County, West Virginia
title: WKYW-LP
